doc:
Gustave Kervern https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gustave_Kervern 0 Gustave Kervern (born 27 August 1962), also known as Gustave de Kervern and Gustave K/Vern, is a French actor, director and screenwriter. He is best known for his collaboration with Benoît Delépine. Gustave_Kervern ( born 27_August_1962 ) , also_known as Gustave de Kervern and Gustave_K/Vern , is a_French_actor , director_and_screenwriter . He is_best_known for his_collaboration with Benoît_Delépine .
